= 编译SDK =

%toc

== 加入自定义的SDK ==
=== 1.编写自定义的Android.mk ===
{{{class="brush:"
$ vim framework/base/Android.mk

在non_base_dirs变量后加入自定义的包名，如:
non_base_dirs := \
	../../external/apache-http/src/org/apache/http
	../../vender/mokoid/frameworks/base/core/service/java
}}}

=== 2.运行编译命令 ===
{{{class="brush: bash"
$lunch sdk-eng
$make sdk
或者
$make PRODUCT-dma6410xp-sdk
}}}

=== 3.生成SDK ===
{{{class="brush:text"
生成的SDK目录:out/host/linux-x86/sdk/
}}}
